author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...RAYMOND JUST OFF THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO... ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING IN AREAS OF HIGHER TERRAIN THROUGH SATURDAY...
summary: ...RAYMOND JUST OFF THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO... ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING IN AREAS OF HIGHER TERRAIN THROUGH SATURDAY... As of 12:00 AM CST Fri Oct 10 the center of Raymond was located near 17.0, -102.8 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 50 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
